messages.title: Theresa May's NHS Crisis
messages.content: Waiting times at record highs, key services under strain, further massive cuts planned. Our NHS is on the brink.

messages.title: The Choice for Our NHS
messages.content: A better future for our NHS with the Lib Dems or more of Theresa May's uncaring cuts to our NHS. Change the future for our NHS, vote Liberal Democrat on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will put 1p on Income Tax to raise an extra £6 billion a year for our NHS and social care.

The Liberal Democrats plan a 'Five-Point Recovery Plan' to protect health and social care in the longer term, focusing on areas including social care, general practice, mental health, and public health.

issues.health: Our NHS is on the brink. Theresa May's cuts causing record high waiting times, key services under strain, and further massive cuts planned. Liberal Democrats propose putting 1p on Income Tax to raise £6 billion a year for the NHS and social care.

quotes.text: 'Cuts have left NHS on the brink of collapse says shocking report.'
'Secret plan for £22billion of NHS cuts could force A&Es, hospitals and maternity units to shut.'
'More than four in 10 hospitals in England declared a major alert.'
'NHS cuts blamed for 30,000 deaths in new study.'
'The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase Income Tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.'

images.caption: 1p extra on income tax means £6 billion extra to boost our NHS and social care.
